title: ‘Beverly Hills’ Episode 3 and an Interview with Sanya Richards-Ross of ‘Atlanta’ | Morally Corrupt
description:
Rachel and Amelia start the show with a chat about recent rumors in Bravo-ville (1:37) before Rachel welcomes ‘The Real Housewives of Atlanta’ newest cast member Sanya Richards-Ross to recap that show’s fourth episode (17:44). Finally, Rachel is joined by Amelia and Jodi to break down Episode 3 of ‘The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ (51:08).
Host: Rachel Lindsay
Guests: Amelia Wedemeyer, Jodi Walker, and Sanya Richards-Ross
Producers: Devon Manze and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
